mapper.update: UPDATE t_dedication_verses SET info = #{info},time = #{time} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,type,uuid,item_type,record_id,time,flag,info,ymd,descJson,itemJson FROM t_dedication_verses WHERE type =0 AND record_id in (SELECT flock_id FROM t_flock_user WHERE uuid =#{uuid}) ORDER BY time desc

SELECT dv.id,dv.time,dv.type,dv.item_type,dv.info,dv.item_id,dv.content_id,lv.lesson_name as versionName FROM t_dedication_verses dv left join t_flock_lesson_view lv on dv.item_id = lv.item_id and dv.content_id = lv.item_content_id AND dv.item_type = lv.type where dv.uuid = #{uuid} AND dv.type =1 order by dv.time desc

select dv.record_id,dv.id,dv.time,dv.type,dv.item_type,dv.info,rv.item_id,rv.item_content_id as contentId,lv.lesson_name as versionName,t.nickname,t.avatar from t_dedication_verses dv left join t_task_record_all_view rv on dv.item_type = rv.type and dv.record_id = rv.record_id left join t_flock_lesson_view lv on rv.item_id = lv.item_id and rv.item_content_id = lv.item_content_id LEFT JOIN t_user_account t on t.uuid =dv.uuid where dv.record_id in (SELECT parent_id FROM ${tableName} WHERE flock_id =#{flockId} AND ymd = #{ymd}) order by dv.time desc
